instruction: Summarize the contents of a text about sustainable energy practices.
input: Sustainable energy practices involve reducing energy consumption and relying on renewable sources instead of traditional non-renewable energy sources.
output: Sustainable energy practices focus on decreasing energy use and utilizing renewable resources to reduce dependence on traditional non-renewable energy sources. This includes activities such as increasing efficiency, improving insulation, installing solar panels, utilizing hydro or geothermal power, and utilizing wind or biomass energy. Additionally, individuals can also adopt sustainable practices, such as reducing household energy consumption and purchasing energy-efficient appliances.
